division.name: Arms Vertebral column
division.group: Axioappendicular muscles, Posterior axioappendicular muscles, Extrinsic shoulder muscles

element.name: Hand - latissimus dorsi muscle
element.action: pulls the forelimb dorsally and caudally

element.name: Hand - trapezius muscle
element.action: Descending (superior) part elevates; ascending (inferior) part depresses; and middle part (or all parts together) retracts scapula; descending and ascending parts act together to rotate glenoid cavity superiorly

element.name: Hand - levator scapulae muscle, roots
element.nerves: nerve to scalene and levator scapulae muscles
element.action: Elevates scapula and tilts its glenoid cavity inferiorly by rotating scapula

element.name: Hand - levator scapulae muscle, scapular
element.action: Elevates scapula and tilts its glenoid cavity inferiorly by rotating scapula

element.name: Hand - levator claviculae muscle
element.nerves: C1-C4, upper cervical ventral spinal roots

element.name: Hand - rhomboid major muscle
element.action: Retracts the scapula and rotates it to depress the glenoid cavity. It also fixes the scapula to the thoracic wall

element.name: Hand - rhomboid minor muscle
element.action: Retracts the scapula and rotates it to depress the glenoid cavity. It also fixes the scapula to the thoracic wall

element.name: Hand - pectoralis major muscle
element.action: Clavicular head: flexes the humerus. Sternocostal head: extends the humerus. As a whole, adducts and medially rotates the humerus. It also draws the scapula anteriorly and inferiorly

element.name: Hand - pectoralis minor muscle
element.action: stabilizes the scapula by drawing it inferiorly and anteriorly against the thoracic wall

element.name: Hand - serratus anterior muscle
element.action: Retracts the scapula and rotates it to depress the glenoid cavity. It also fixes the scapula to the thoracic wall

element.name: Hand - sternalis muscle
element.nerves: thoracic and thoracicoabdominal intercostal nerves, flexors
element.action: protract and stabilize scapula, assists in upward rotation

element.name: Vessels - wall of brachial artery smooth muscles
element.action: provide a more or less steady supply of blood at normal pressure into the capillary beds

element.name: Vessels - forearm blood vessels
element.nerves: middle cervical ganglion, sympathetic fibers, grey communicating rami
element.action: ensures adequate flow of oxygenated blood to hands and fingers

element.name: Vessels - arm blood vessels
element.nerves: stellate ganglion, sympathetic fibers, grey communicating rami
element.action: ensures adequate flow of oxygenated blood to arms

element.name: Hand - deltoid muscle, lateral and posterior
Hand - infraspinatus muscle
element.action: Lateral rotation of arm and Adduction of arm and stabilizes humerus

element.name: Hand - supraspinatus muscle
element.action: abduction of arm and stabilizes humerus

element.name: Hand - teres minor muscle
element.action: laterally rotates and adducts the arm

element.name: Hand - triceps brachii muscle, radial
element.nerves: radial nerve, upper arm muscular branches
element.action: extends forearm, caput longum adducts shoulder

element.name: Hand - triceps brachii muscle, axillary
element.nerves: axillary nerve, motor branch to triceps brachii
element.action: extends forearm, caput longum adducts shoulder

element.name: Hand - anconeus muscle
element.nerves: radial nerve, upper arm muscular branches
element.action: partly blended in with the triceps, which it assists in extension of the forearm. Stabilises the elbow and abducts the ulna during pronation

element.name: Hand - pronator teres muscle
element.nerves: median nerve, superficial muscles in foream

element.name: Hand - flexor carpi radialis muscle
element.nerves: median nerve, superficial muscles in hand

element.name: Hand - palmaris longus muscle
element.nerves: median nerve, superficial muscles in hand

element.name: Hand - flexor digitorum superficialis muscle
element.nerves: median nerve, intermediate muscles of foream
element.action: flexor of fingers (primarily at proximal interphalangeal joints)

element.name: Hand - pronator quadratus muscle
element.nerves: interosseous nerve of forearm, anterior, deep muscles of forearm

element.name: Hand - flexor digitorum profundus muscle, interosseous
element.nerves: interosseous nerve of forearm, anterior, hand

element.name: Hand - flexor digitorum profundus muscle, ulnar
Hand - flexor pollicis longus muscle
element.nerves: interosseous nerve of forearm, anterior, hand

element.name: Hand - brachioradialis muscle
element.nerves: radial nerve, upper arm muscular branches

element.name: Hand - extensor carpi radialis brevis muscle
element.nerves: radial nerve, deep branch before supinator
element.action: extensor at the wrist joint, abducts the hand at the wrist

element.name: Hand - extensor carpi radialis longus muscle
element.nerves: radial nerve, upper arm muscular branches
element.action: extensor and abductor of the hand at the wrist joint

element.name: Hand - extensor carpi ulnaris muscle
element.action: extends the little finger at all joints

element.name: Hand - extensor pollicis brevis muscle
element.action: extension of thumb at metacarpophalangeal joint

element.name: Hand - extensor pollicis longus muscle
element.action: extension of the thumb (metacarpophalangeal and interphalangeal)

element.name: Hand - flexor pollicis brevis muscle, median
Hand - flexor pollicis brevis muscle, ulnar
Hand - adductor pollicis muscle
element.nerves: ulnar nerve, adductor pollicis and lumbrical
element.action: adducts the thumb at the carpometacarpal joint

element.name: Hand - abductor digiti minimi muscle of hand
Hand - flexor digiti minimi brevis of hand
Hand - opponens digiti minimi muscle
element.action: draws 5th metacarpal anteriorly and rotates it, bringing little finger (5th digit) into opposition with thumb

element.name: Hand - lumbricals of the hand muscles, median
element.action: flex metacarpophalangeal joints, extend interphalangeal joints

element.name: Hand - lumbricals of the hand muscles, ulnar
element.nerves: ulnar nerve, adductor pollicis and lumbrical
element.action: flex metacarpophalangeal joints, extend interphalangeal joints

element.name: Hand - dorsal interossei muscles of the hand
